item.title: Biden Promotes DEI-Pushing Air Force Officials On His Way Out The Door
item.description: Two Air Force officers promoted by Joe Biden have openly promoted DEI in their capacities as military officials.

item.title: Tyson Vs. Paul Is The Post-Election, Feel-Good Slugfest America Needs

item.title: Trump’s Foreign Policy Agenda Must Start By Undoing Four Years Of Global Insolvency
item.description: American resources are limited. We must address the greatest threats from large, powerful countries like China first, then everyone else.
